# Draft:Kingvention

----
----
Kingvention is an annual fan convention dedicated to celebrating the life, music, and legacy of Michael Jackson. Established in 2015, it is recognized as the only European convention exclusively focused on Jackson and his global fan base. The event features rare memorabilia exhibitions, panel discussions with individuals who worked directly with Jackson, film screenings, and live performances.
History
Kingvention was founded by Pez Jax, author of Off the Wall: From The Beginning, Brick by Brick and The Story of HIStory. The inaugural event took place on 12 September 2015 in London. Since then, the convention has grown in size and reputation, drawing fans and industry professionals from around the world.
In 2024, Kingvention expanded internationally with its first U.S. edition held in Los Angeles, featuring panels and exhibitions with artists and collaborators connected to Michael Jackson.
Kingvention has also collaborated with Propstore on multiple occasions to display original Michael Jackson costumes, including the "Next Generation" Pepsi jacket and the "Spike" rabbit costume from Moonwalker, ahead of public auctions.

Programming
Each year features interviews, panel discussions, Q&A sessions, tribute performances, rare screenings, and exhibitions of costumes and memorabilia.
Notable Guests
* Ashlei Tave – Actress and stunt performer in the biopic Michael
* Betty Pecha Madden – Costume designer for Captain EO and Moonwalker
* Bill Whitfield – Michael Jackson's personal bodyguard (2006–2009)
* Bonnie Sinclair – Costume designer for Captain EO and Moonwalker
* Clay Tave – Michael Jackson’s former bodyguard
* Craig Lamont Parks – Michael Jackson stand-in and photo double
* Dan Beck – Former Sony Music executive
* Darryl Phinnessee – Grammy-winning singer and vocal director
* Diana Walczak – Creator of the HIStory album statue
* Donna Schultz – Costume designer for Captain EO and Moonwalker
* Dorian Holley – Vocal coach and backing singer for Jackson
* Eddie Wolfl – Photographer
* Eddie Garcia – Dancer and choreographer on tours and short films
* Jean-Marie Horvat – Grammy-nominated producer and mixer
* Jonathan Morrish – Former Sony Music executive
* Larry Stessel – Former senior music executive, Sony
* Rob Hoffman – Recording engineer and musician
* Steven Paul Whitsitt – Photographer
* Thom Russo – Grammy-winning producer and composer
* Yuko Jackson – Dancer
* Bill Nation – Photographer
* Siedah Garrett – Singer-songwriter and Jackson collaborator
* LaVelle Smith Jr. – Choreographer and dancer
* Kevin Dorsey – Vocal director and musician
* Brad Buxer – Musical director and keyboardist
* Michael Durham Prince – Recording engineer
* Nicholas Pike – Composer of soundtrack for GHOSTS and You Rock My World
